name: real_time_price
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: This endpoint is a lightweight method that allows retrieving only the real-time price of the selected instrument.

symbol.description: The instrument symbol, which can be any equity, index, ETF, forex, or cryptocurrency (e.g., `AAPL`, `EUR/USD`, `ETH/BTC`).

format.description: The format of the response. Can be 'CSV' or 'JSON'. Default is 'JSON'.

outputsize.description: The number of data points to return. Default is 30.
